title: Early Rising
description: Wake up early and start the day with a fresh mind

title: Complete 5-Time Namaz
description: Perform all five daily prayers on time

title: Study for 8 Hours
description: Invest at least 8 hours in productive study

title: Be Honest
description: Avoid lying and practice honesty throughout the day

title: Good Behavior with Parents
description: Maintain a kind and respectful attitude with parents

title: Limit Social Media Use
description: Spend no more than 1 hour on social media today
